Bernd 2012-06-02 07:21:49.486476 Nr. 29589 [Antworten]
csa-fx3.png csa-fx3.png
PNG, 540x360, 8 kB
Confederate ball.png Confederate ball.png
PNG, 17x14, 358 bytes

Dear General,

As a man of the South region of America I feel pride in my region's history and culture within the United States of America. Yes easily made jokes about Dixie and her demographics/poverty aside, we contributed a great deal to the forming of our nation while generally having a completely different development history. We produced Poe, Faulkner, Twain, numerous inventors, presidents, food, and unique architecture. We have a reputation abroad, for better or worse, and many nationals identify us as Southern. Therefor, I request that the general region of the CSA have their USA balls replaced with Confederate ones. I have good reason to believe that this will cause no strife to the /int/ community, I am not a nationalist bent on making a symbol to troll other parts of the country. Most people from America's other regions associate us with the past and with that symbol and having a confederate flag ball as our icon as we post will identify us for them. I appreciate your reading of my petition on behalf of Southerners.

Bernd 2012-06-01 21:18:03.625292 Nr. 29567 [Antworten]
fett.jpg fett.jpg
JPG, 500x500, 66 kB

Has KC ever considered borrowing some features from other imageboard software? One in particular I was looking at was NorthBoard software, the software Northpole uses. [https://github.com/Sopsys/NorthBoard/] They have an inbuilt thread-watcher; the "read count" updates via the server, when you view the thread it resets the unread count. Looking at the code, it's very efficient and doesn't use much resources. It also helps with talking in a lot of threads at once since you don't need to use silly hacky addons such as DollChan userscript that aren't server-based and their thread-watcher probably uses more bandwidth and I/O than a serverside one would use.

(I know you don't like to take suggestions since you're always busy and such, just wanted to throw it out there)

>>
λ 2012-06-01 22:58:18.231572 Nr. 29570

On the server side, we won't be able to borrow much from NB because a) the code is messy as hell (as the admins say themselves) b) KC runs on DesuChan which is written in Perl and employs some caching that makes most of NB's dynamic features impractical.
On the client side, lazyness.

Hinweis / Notice
  1. Diese Site ist für Leute mit gesundem Menschenverstand und Humor gedacht, die mit Sarkasmus, Ironie und Zynismus umgehen können. Denk gründlich nach, bevor du etwas, das hier gepostet wurde, für bare Münze nimmst.
  2. Darüber hinaus enthält sie teilweise Dinge, die nur für ein erwachsenes Publikum geeignet sind. Wenn du minderjährig bist, geh bitte woanders hin.
  3. Bevor du hier irgendwas tust, mach dich mit den Regeln vertraut.
Glaubst du, das bekommst du hin? Ja | Nein
  1. This site is meant for people with common sense and humor who can deal with sarcasm, irony and cynicism. Think carefully before you take something that was posted here at face value.
  2. Furthermore, it contains some things that are only suitable for an adult audience. If you're a minor, please go somewhere else.
  3. Before you do anything here, familiarize yourself with the rules.
